items.name: Advanced Fishing Trap
items.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Trap. Though aLureis not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching a rarer type of fish. To attach a lure to the Advanced Fishing Trap, inspect the trap by pressing 'F' and drag the lure into the dedicated lure slot.

items.name: Anti-Parasitic Paste
items.description: Anti-Parasitic Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in theTier 1tech tree. Reduces the duration of theParasitesdebuff upon consumption.

items.name: Anti-Poison Paste
items.description: Anti-Poison Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in the tier 1 tech tree. Reduces the duration ofPoisonfrom critters like theVenomous Fishor theCaveworm.

items.name: Antibiotic Paste
items.description: Antibiotic Paste reduces the duration of bacterial infections like food poisoning and theCave Sicknessdebuff from caves by 50% upon consumption.

items.name: Antibiotic Pill
items.description: Antibiotic Pills are used to cure, and prevent for a short time, further ailments such asCave Sickness,Infected Wounds, andFood Poisoning.

items.name: Antibiotic Tonic
items.description: Used alone to cure infections such asCave Sickness,Infected Wound, andFood poisoning, or as a mid-stage ingredient to the prophylacticAntibiotic Pill.

items.name: Basic Bandage
items.description: Basic Bandage is used to heal Wound and Exotic WoundStatus Effects.

items.name: Basic Dried Meat
items.description: Basic Dried Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Basic Fishing Rod
items.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Rod. Though a lure is not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching fish of a certain rarity or increase the size of the capture area. For a list of available lures, view thispage.

items.name: Basic Fishing Trap
items.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Trap. Though aLureis not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching a rarer type of fish. To attach a lure to the Basic Fishing Trap, inspect the trap by pressing 'F' and drag the lure into the dedicated lure slot.

items.name: Berry & Seed Bar
items.description: Full of energy for long hikes, long lasting effects and easily crafted.

items.name: Berry Farming Packet
items.description: The Berry Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Berry seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

items.name: Berry Jam
items.description: Berry Jam is a long-lastingFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Berry Jam,Strawberry JamandPickled Carrot, does not spoil and is therefore a valuable food for long-term storage.

items.name: Berry Smoked Saltwater Fillet
items.description: Berry Smoked Saltwater Fillet is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Blood Thinning Paste
items.description: Blood Thinning Paste is one of the multiple, easily overlooked recipes available in theTier 1tech tree. Reduces the duration ofConcussionsandContusionswhen you're unlucky enough to kiss a falling tree.

items.name: Bread
items.description: Bread is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Bread Dough
items.description: Bread Dough is the precursor to the mid/late-gameFoodBread. Bread Dough will eventually decay, but can be preserved in anIce Box,Refrigerator, orDeep Freeze.

items.name: Caramel Berry Tart
items.description: Caramel Berry Tart is late-gameFoodthat when consumed provides a considerable boost to stamina, speed, resistance to cave sickness and a chance to mine additional stone.

items.name: Carbon Paste
items.description: Carbon Paste is a crafted resource meant to be smelted in aConcrete FurnaceorElectric Furnaceto makeCarbon Fiberand is a critical component inTier 4crafting.

items.name: Cocoa Smoked Soft Meat
items.description: Cocoa Smoked Soft Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Composite Paste
items.description: Composite Paste is an end-game crafted resource which can be smelted intoCompositesinside of theElectric Furnace.

items.name: Cooked Bacon
items.description: Cooked Bacon is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Cooked Fatty T-Bone
items.description: Cooked Fatty T-Bone is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Cooked Gamey Meat
items.description: Cooked Gamey Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Cooked Giant Steak
items.description: Cooked Giant Steak is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Cooked Meat
items.description: Cooked Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Cooked Soft Meat
items.description: Cooked Soft Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Cooked Stringy Meat
items.description: Cooked Stringy Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Cooked White Meat
items.description: Cooked White Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Cooling Bandage
items.description: The Cooling Bandage is used to heal Heatstroke, Heat Exhaustion and Exotic OverheatStatus Effects. If the Prospector's core temperature is still extremely high, the cooling bandage will not remove these debuffs.

items.name: Cured Leather
items.description: Cured Leather is a crafted resource used in variousTier 3ArmorsandTools. Below is a list of armors that use Cured Leather:

base_recipe.crafted_at:
Crafted at
 Drying Rack Smoker Advanced Textiles Bench

items.name: Cured Leather Lure
items.description: The Cured Leather Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone size increase widens the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Cured Leather Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Dried Gamey Meat
items.description: Dried Gamey Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Dried Soft Meat
items.description: Dried Soft Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Dried Stringy Meat
items.description: Dried Stringy Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Dried White Meat
items.description: Dried White Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Electronic Food Trough
items.description: AllFood Troughshave an allow list for nearby animals that can be accessed by pressing 'X'. To change which animals can eat from a specific food trough, select the animals permitted to eat from the food trough and select "Allowlist-Only Interaction". By default, all nearby animals can eat from food troughs.

items.name: Fish Chunk Stew
items.description: Fish Chunk Stew is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Fish Chunks
items.description: Fish Chunks are added to the Prospector's inventory after looting the carcass of a fish. Fish caught using a Fishing Trap or Fishing Rod can be converted into Fish Chunks as well. Fish Chunks can be cooked in aCampfire, or used in other dishes such asFreshwater Fillet CurryorCrumbed Saltwater Fillet. Right-click a Freshwater/Saltwater fish to convert it intoFish Chunks.

items.name: Fish Pie
items.description: Fish Pie is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Fish Trophy Mount
items.description: The Fish Trophy Mount can be used to display impressive catches with details of the quality, weight, and length of the fish shown. When holding down R, Prospectors can choose between 3 different variants. Fish stored in the Fish Trophy Mount will not spoil. All Fish obtained using aFishing Rodor Fishing Trap can be placed in the Fish Trophy Mount.

items.name: Fisher's Module
items.description: This module increases the user's ability to catchUnique Fishand, somehow, increases the quality of caught fish. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Fisher's Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit, which will further increasing the user's ability to fish and become the Master Angler they wish to be.

items.name: Flatbread
items.description: Flatbread is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Flatbread Dough
items.description: Flatbread Dough is the precursor to the mid/late-gameFoodFlatbread. Flatbread Dough will eventually decay, but can be preserved in anIce Box,Refrigerator, orDeep Freeze.

items.name: Food Consumption Paste
items.description: In-game description:An organic confection that arrests hunger for a limited time.In-game flavor text:Just because it's organic, doesn't mean it's good for you.

items.name: Food Trough
items.description: The Food Trough is a basic trough used to feedMounts/Petsand is recommended if prospectors wish to idly tame a juvenile. Food Troughs benefit from theExtra Space I/Extra Space IItalent.

items.name: Freshwater Fish Fillet
items.description: Freshwater Fish Fillet is is the result of filleting a Freshwater Fish at aBasic Fishing Bench. While eating Freshwater Fish Fillet will replenish a small amount ofHunger, there is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookbefore eating.

items.name: Fried Fish Chunks
items.description: Fried Fish Chunks is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Glass Food Trough
items.description: The Glass Food Trough is a decorative upgrade to theFood Troughand allows multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously, similar to theLarge Food Trough. Glass Food Troughs benefit from theExtra Space I/Extra Space IItalent.

items.name: Gorse Smoked Gamey Meat
items.description: Gorse Smoked Gamey Meat is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Health Buff Paste
items.description: In-game description:An organic preparation that temporarily increases health.In-game flavor text:Like so many things on Icarus, the exact ingredients would probably render this concoction illegal on Earth.

items.name: Health Regeneration Paste
items.description: In-game description:A herbal confection that speeds healing.In-game flavor text:The lily's high concentration of bioactive ingredients is thought to inhibit the reuptake of certain cytochromes, briefly flooding your body with oxidating enzymes.

items.name: Health Restoration Paste
items.description: In-game description:An organic fusion that restores health.In-game flavor text:The combination of Icarus's unique conditions and genetic adjustments to plant life has seen the addition of 'useful' methyl chains to many previously innocuous plant-based preparations.

items.name: Heat Bandage
items.description: Heat Bandage is used to heal Frostbite, Frosty and Exotic ChillStatus Effects. If the Prospector's core temperature is still freezing, the heat bandage will not remove these debuffs.

items.name: Large Food Trough
items.description: The Large Food Trough is a slight upgrade to theFood Troughthat allows for multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously. Large Food Troughs benefit from theExtra Space I/Extra Space IItalent.

items.name: Meat Pie
items.description: Meat Pie is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Metal Food Trough
items.description: The Metal Food Trough is a decorative upgrade to theFood Troughand allows multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously, similar to theLarge Food Trough. Metal Food Troughs benefit from theExtra Space I/Extra Space IItalent.

items.name: Mixed Berries
items.description: Mixed Berries is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Mushroom Soup
items.description: Mushroom Soup is aFoodthat satisfiesHunger. It provides the uniqueStatus Effect,Mushroom Soup, which increases maximumHealthand improvesStaminaregeneration.

items.name: Oxygen Buff Paste
items.description: In-game description:A natural concoction that increases available oxygen.In-game flavor text:Your parents are a long way from here. What you do with your body is your business.

items.name: Oxygen Consumption Paste
items.description: In-game description:A natural beta blocker.In-game flavor text:This preparation reduces the heart rate, dropping oxygen consumption temporarily.

items.name: Oxygen Restoration Paste
items.description: In-game description:An organic co-factor that rapidly restores oxygen.In-game flavor text:Helper molecule

items.name: Poison Paste
items.description: Poison Paste is used for making a variety of items, such as medicines likeAnti-Poison Pillor ammo likePoison Arrow.

items.name: Potato Bread
items.description: Potato Bread is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Prime Meat Attachment
items.description: Prime Meat Attachment is a mid-to-end game item available once the prospector has unlocked theTool Attachment Packtech.

items.name: Pumpkin Bread
items.description: Pumpkin Bread is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Raw Bacon
items.description: Raw meat can be obtained by skinningWild Boarwith aKnife. While eating raw food will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookbefore eating.

items.name: Raw Chicken
items.description: Raw Chicken can be obtained from the carcass of a once cryogenically frozenChickenthat can be purchased from theWorkshop.

items.name: Raw Copper Lamp
items.description: The Raw Copper Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

items.name: Raw Fatty T-Bone
items.description: Raw Fatty T-Bone can be obtained by Skinning bears with aKnife.

items.name: Raw Gamey Meat
items.description: Raw Gamey Meat can be obtained by Skinning animals with aKnife. Eating Raw Gamey Meat will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookfirst before eating.

items.name: Raw Giant Steak
items.description: Raw Giant Steak can be obtained by Skinning animals with aKnife. Eating Raw Giant Steak will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookfirst before eating.

items.name: Raw Gold Lamp
items.description: The Raw Gold Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

items.name: Raw Meat
items.description: Raw meat can be obtained by skinning animals with aKnife. While eating raw meat will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookbefore eating.

items.name: Raw Oxite Lamp
items.description: The Raw Oxite Lamp is a simple low output lamp that does not require fuel to operate but does require water to craft.

items.name: Raw Soft Meat
items.description: Raw Soft Meat can be obtained by Skinning animals with aKnife. Eating Raw Soft Meat will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookfirst before eating.

items.name: Raw Stringy Meat
items.description: Raw Stringy Meat can be obtained by Skinning animals with aKnife. Eating Raw Stringy Meat will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookfirst before eating.

items.name: Raw White Meat
items.description: Eating Raw White Meat will replenishHealththere is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookfirst before eating.

items.name: Refined Wood Fishing Rod
items.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Rod. Though a lure is not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching fish of a certain rarity or increase the size of the capture area. For a list of available lures, view thispage.

items.name: Rhubarb Stew
items.description: Rhubarb Stew is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Rotten Meat Lure
items.description: The Rotten Meat Lure can be attached to aFishing Rodor aBasic Fishing Trap/Advanced Fishing Trapto provide an increase to different attributes detailed in the infobox. The capture zone increase is the size of the capture area during the fishing minigame, increasing the success chance of catching a fish. Like allLures, the Rotten Meat Lure degrades with use and will eventually break after ten uses.

items.name: Rustic Food Trough
items.description: The Rustic Food Trough is a decorative upgrade to theFood Troughand allows multiple creatures to eat from it simultaneously, similar to theLarge Food Trough. Rustic Food Troughs benefit from theExtra Space I/Extra Space IItalent.

items.name: Saltwater Fish Fillet
items.description: Saltwater Fish Fillet is is the result of filleting a Saltwater Fish at aBasic Fishing Bench. While eating Saltwater Fish Fillet will replenish a small amount ofHunger, there is a possibility of negativeStatus Effectswhen doing so. It is better toCookbefore eating.

items.name: Seed Bread
items.description: Seed Bread is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Shengong "Yeying" Bandage
items.description: The Shengong "Yeying" Bandage is an overly pricedBasic Bandagepurchased from the Workshop that will remove theBleedingmodifier when consumed.

items.name: Spoiled Meat
items.description: Spoiled Meat is a byproduct ofRaw Meatthat has been allowed to go rancid. Can be used to make a variety of items, primarilyPoison Paste. Requires theYou Gonna Eat That?talent for Spoiled Meat to become consumable.

items.name: Stamina Buff Paste
items.description: In-game description:A herbal concoction, temporarily increasing stamina.In-game flavor text:While lacking some of the pharmaceutical refinements, this paste produces similar physiological affects to the 'wakers' once offered to long haul space pilots.

items.name: Stamina Consumption Paste
items.description: In-game description:A biotic compound that slows stamina loss temporarily.In-game flavor text:The time-jarring effects of exotics find their influence in many subtle, poorly understood ways on Icarus.

items.name: Stamina Regeneration Paste
items.description: In-game description:An organic stimulant that accelerates stamina recovery.In-game flavor text:A herbal preparation that acts rapidly on the sympathetic nervous system, increasing noradrenergic activity.

items.name: Stamina Restoration Paste
items.description: In-game description:A natural stimulant that restores lost stamina.In-game flavor text:As countless athletes, party-goers and would-be mystics have noted, the line between natural stimulant and highly addictive narcotic is arbitrary, at best.

items.name: Stew
items.description: Stew is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Strawberries & Cream
items.description: Strawberries & Cream is a long-lastingFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs.

items.name: Strawberry
items.description: Strawberry is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Strawberry Farming Packet
items.description: The Strawberry Farming Packet is unlocked in theWorkshopon theSpace Stationand is equipped in the Prospectors loadout before starting a new prospect. Only after landing on Icarus can the packet be consumed, giving the Prospector five Strawberry seeds, which then can be planted inDirt Moundsor Crop plots to growPlant Resources.

items.name: Strawberry Hard Candy
items.description: Strawberry Hard Candy is a consumable food that provides a quick boost of movement speed.

items.name: Strawberry Jam
items.description: Strawberry Jam is a long-lastingFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Strawberry Jam,Berry JamandPickled Carrot, do not spoil and is therefore a valuable food for long-term storage.

items.name: Sweetcorn Soup
items.description: Sweetcorn Soup is aFoodwith a uniqueStatus Effect, which can be stacked with other food buffs. Can be eaten to satisfyHunger.

items.name: Tomato Soup
items.description: Tomato Soup is a consumableFoodcrafted fromTomatoesandWater. AsTomatoesare only found onPrometheus, this recipe requires the New Frontiers DLC to obtain the ingredients.

items.name: Volatile Raw Exotics
items.description: While theExoticsprospectors found onOlympusandStyxwere originally believed to be the only known variation, the UDA has made a remarkable discovery. This unstable variant is different and appears to have an impact on the local flora not seen before.

items.name: Water Consumption Paste
items.description: In-game description:A natural preparation, temporarily reducing the body's need for water.In-game flavor text:The key word here is 'temporarily'.

items.name: Wild Berry
items.description: Wild Berry are a common form ofPlantlifefound in theForestandRiverlandslocationson Icarus. When consumed by prospectors, they replenish bothHungerandThirst.

items.name: Wooden Fishing Rod
items.description: One approach to catching fish is by using a Fishing Rod. Though a lure is not required, attaching one can increase the quality, length, and weight of the caught fish. Additionally, certain lures can increase the odds of catching fish of a certain rarity or increase the size of the capture area. For a list of available lures, view thispage.
